text: Teraemi akasasamuha arau prthirai chaya dinata srsti karaiche; tara pichata te'om arasbara oparata uthiche. Te'om jane yi bhugarbhata praraesa karae arau yi bhugarbhara paraa olaya, arau akasara paraa yi aratirna haya arau yi akasalai uthi yaya; arau tomaloka yaâ€™te'i nathaka kiya-- te'om tomalokara lagata ache, arau tomaloke yi karaa se'i samparke allaha samyaka drasta
